content: गामिन् {%<ab>a.</ab>%} [गम्-णिनि] (Only at the end of <ab>comp.</ab>) {@--1@} Going, moving, walking; वैदिशगामी <ls>M. 5</ls>; मृगेंद्रगामी <ls>R. 2. 30</ls> having the gait of a lion; कुब्ज° <ls>Pt. 2. 5</ls>; अलस° <ls>Amaru. 51.</ls> {@--2@} Riding; द्विरद° <ls>R. 4. 4.</ls> {@--3@} Going or reaching to, extending or applying to, relating to; ननु सखीगामी दोषः <ls>Ś. 4</ls>; द्वितीयगामी न हि शब्द एष नः <ls>R. 3. 49.</ls> {@--4@} Leading or going to, accruing to; चित्रकूटगामी मार्गः; कर्तृगामि क्रियाफलं. {@--5@} United with; सदृशभर्तृगामिनी <ls>M. 5.</ls> {@--6@} Passing over to, devolving on; <ls>Ś. 6</ls>; <ls>Y. 2. 145.</ls>
